channel.title: Blade on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Blade on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Kevin Feige Explains ‘Blade’ Delays: ‘We Didn’t Want to Simply Put a Leather Outfit’ on Mahershala Ali ‘and Have Him Start Killing Vampires’
item.description: Despite numerous false starts, Mahershala Ali’s debut as a vampire slayer in “Blade” is still in the works, Marvel Studios chief Kevin Feige confirmed. “Mahershala is still attached,” Feige told a roo
